data.name: Trucking
data.detailed_description:
You are an ordinary guy who likes to drive a truck. You think that trucks are elegant, graceful and incredibly beautiful. You are ready to polish every bolt of your pet, despite the fact that there are millions of them. You are able to pick up cargo from the most unprepared cargo areas using every available millimeter. You don't care how much you get paid for it. You do not need to spend on this effort. You only need to apply your skill.

Take the test of time and prove that you are the best.

Features:
- 50 levels - Time-limited parking
- Multi target Parking (Checkpoints)
- Vehicle upgrade system (Engine, Brake, Speed)
- Different spawn point for each level
- Game Statistics billboard
- Best time and current time
- Star awards
- GPS system with flash light

data.short_description: Forget everything you used to know about shipping. Here you will know what real work is.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 2.3GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or ATI Radeon X800 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 3.2GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5GB NVIDIA GeForce 500 series or ATI Radeon 6000 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
